turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey I'm heading home in a bit and I'm just going to grab some pizza from Pizza Zone on the way for the wife and kids. Can you order it for me and I'll grab it on my way?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, which location are you going to pick it up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one just off the freeway, I forgot the name of the street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me look at the locations real quick. The one on Branson street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what do you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have any deals right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well how many pizzas do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Probably 2 large pizzas should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay they have a buy one get one half off deal with unlimited toppings on each.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay do that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what toppings do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do one veggie with bell peppers, onions, tomatoes and olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the other?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get pepperoni, sausage and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about crusts?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They have stuffed crust, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay do one stuffed crust and one hand tossed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which do you want the stuffed crust for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The pepperoni and sausage one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay any sides or sauces?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah get a couple of marinara and garlics. Don't do any sides.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so 2 large pizzas. One with stuffed crust and pepperoni, sausage and extra cheese. The other with hand tossed crust and bell peppers, onions, tomatoes and olives. Plus 2 marinara and garlic sauces?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, that should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. I just ordered and it'll be ready in about 25 minutes. They'll text you the receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
